attributes.action: allow smoking in non food pubs and clubs, if the house of commons can keep thier smoking room then why cant we??
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we wish to lobby the pm about loosing our private smoking rooms, why must the public loose out when the houses of commons can stil keep thier smoking room

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
